ðŸŸ¢ FlixQuest (formerly Cinemax) v2.4.0 changes:
- Added Opensubtitles integration for Movies/TV shows that doesn't have subtitle by default
- Customized the player to be more simpler to use and more aesthetic
- Added PIP (Picture in Picture) support for the player
- Added option to lock the player
- Added option to copy stream link into other apps
- App language change now takes place instantly, no need to reopen the app
- Fixed multiple bugsn- Added more buffer extent options
Note that the new updates installs another app on your phone since the name is changed, you can delete the older one.
Go to telegram @flixquestapp for more
